Help Us Fight Cancer — Donate Today

The American Cancer Research Foundation is dedicated to funding groundbreaking cancer research across the United States. Since 1987, we have invested over $2.3 billion in research grants, supporting more than 4,500 scientists at leading institutions.

How Your Donation Helps
- $25 provides lab supplies for one day of research
- $100 funds a week of clinical trial support
- $500 sponsors a graduate research fellowship
- $1,000 supports a full research project phase

Our Programs
We fund research at universities and medical centers nationwide. Our current focus areas include immunotherapy, early detection technologies, and health equity in underserved communities.

Volunteer With Us
Join thousands of volunteers across the country who organize walkathons, fundraising galas, and awareness campaigns. No experience necessary — we provide all training and materials.

Annual Gala
Our annual fundraising gala brings together donors, researchers, and survivors for an evening of celebration and hope. This year's event features keynote speaker Dr. Sarah Chen, renowned oncologist and researcher.
